messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Welcome to the station crew, remember to set your suit sensors to max and have a safe shift

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Level 4 Infectious Revival Agent onboard, quaratine is now in effect. No one is allowed ot leave or be blown up by surronding Nanotrasen ships

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Commander Osteen. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
